metadata.description: At last, the ultimate confrontation between not just GRIMLOCK and his somewhat-estranged fellow Dinobots, SLUDGE, SLAG, SNARL, and SWOOP, but also Sunstreaker/Hunter, Scorponok, Hot Rod, Skywatch and a whole army of Headmasters! Mayhem, machinations, melee, and, of course, Maximum Dinobots, all courtesy of TRANSFORMERS uber-scribe Simon Furman and fan-favorite Nick Roche!
metadata.name: Transformers: Maximum Dinobots
